com.badlogic.gdx.automation.recorder.formats

Interface InputRecordWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonInputRecordWriter, MemoryInputRecordWriter

    public interface InputRecordWriter
extends java.io.Flushable, java.io.Closeable
    Interface for classes providing means to save or transmit user input recorded by am InputRecorder. This could be a JsonInputRecordWriter as well as a writer to send input over the network to a receiver.
